      void handle(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)

    • Constructor Detail

      • restartButtonGUI

        public restartButtonGUI()

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        A function that takes the ArrayList of Player from the GameEngine and refreshes it by setting every player as alive and not killable and not active. It then sets the first player as the current player which is active and killable along with creating the GUI grid with the color of the first player. It also disables the Undo button
        Specified by:
        handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
        Parameters:
        e - the ActionEvent of the Restart button clicked
